body_html: Not sure how would that solve it. Aliasing will be faster in most (all?) cases, so you pretty much know the result already. The only question is when do you choose to pay the setup cost (i.e. when do you expect that it will get amortized)?

body: Not sure how would that solve it. Aliasing will be faster in most (all?) cases, so you pretty much know the result already. The only question is when do you choose to pay the setup cost (i.e. when do you expect that it will get amortized)?
